name: doughtily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a determined and brave way that shows you are unwilling to stop trying to achieve something: He is doughtily sticking to his plan, despite criticism from his family. Nobody has campaigned more doughtily than she has for the environment. Related word
doughty
More examplesFewer examplesThe city has retained its doughtily independent character.He has always doughtily defended her against her critics. He has been doughtily following a new exercise and diet regime since he had a heart attack.She has continued to play doughtily despite disappointment and injury.
